query.statement:
SELECT A.ARA_NM ARA_NM, A.BSU_NM BSU_NM, A.BSU, A.GBN, A.KND, A.CNT01, A.AMT01, A.CNT02, A.AMT02, A.CNT03, A.AMT03, A.CNT04, A.AMT04, A.CNT05, A.AMT05, A.CNT06, A.AMT06, A.CNT07, A.AMT07, A.CNT08, A.AMT08, A.CNT09, A.AMT09, A.CNT10, A.AMT10, A.CNT11, A.AMT11, A.CNT12, A.AMT12, A.CNT13, A.AMT13, A.CNT_H, A.AMT_H FROM ( SELECT A.ARA_NM ARA_NM, A.ARA, A.BSU_NM BSU_NM, A.BSU, '¹Ì¹ßÁÖ' GBN, '' KND, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '25' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT01, 0 AMT01, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT02, 0 AMT02, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT03, 0 AMT03, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT04, 0 AMT04, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT05, 0 AMT05, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT06, 0 AMT06, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT07, 0 AMT07, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '24' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT08, 0 AMT08, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT09, 0 AMT09, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT10, 0 AMT10, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '07' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT11, 0 AMT11, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT12, 0 AMT12, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD NOT IN ('25','03','05','01','12','04','02','06','11','07','09') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT13, 0 AMT13, COUNT(*) CNT_H, 0 AMT_H FROM ( SELECT A.PJT PJT ,A.HNO HNO ,F.BLD BLD ,VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(F.MANDT,'CS115',F.ARA),'') ARA_NM ,VALUE(F.ARA,'') ARA ,VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(F.MANDT,F.BSU),'') BSU_NM ,VALUE(F.BSU,'') BSU FROM ( SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.BGT, A.USD, A.PJTM, A.PJTU, A.WDT, A.WNO, A.SCT, A.RCD, A.IGD, A.ISD, A.IJY, A.BGT_A, A.BMT_A, A.GNO_A, A.USD_C, A.UHJ_C, A.GNO_C FROM ( SELECT B.CS101_PJT PJT, B.CS101_HNO HNO, MAX(B.CS101_ARA) ARA, MAX(B.CS101_BSU) BSU, MIN(B.CS101_WDT) WDT, MIN(B.CS101_WNO) WNO, MIN(B.CS101_SCT) SCT, MIN(B.CS101_RCD) RCD, MIN(B.CS101_IGD) IGD, MIN(B.CS101_ISD) ISD, MIN(B.CS101_IJY) IJY, MIN(VALUE(A.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT, MIN(VALUE(C.CS126_USD,'')) USD, MIN(VALUE(D.CS116_PJT,'')) PJTM, MIN(VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'')) PJTU, MIN(VALUE(F.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT_A, MAX(VALUE(F.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT_A, MAX(VALUE(F.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO_A, MIN(VALUE(G.CS126_USD,'')) USD_C, MAX(VALUE(G.CS126_UHJ,'')) UHJ_C, MAX(VALUE(G.CS126_GNO,'')) GNO_C FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 A ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND A.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND A.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS116_GND = 'B' AND A.CS116_BST <= #DAT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND C.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_GND = 'D' AND C.CS126_ADT <= #DAT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 D ON D.MANDT = B.MANDT AND D.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND D.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND D.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND D.CS116_GND = 'A' AND D.CS116_BST <= #DAT# AND D.CS116_BGT <= #DAT# AND D.CS116_BMT >= SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6)||'01' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 E ON E.MANDT = B.MANDT AND E.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND E.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND E.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND E.CS126_DDT = '' AND E.CS126_GND = 'C' AND E.CS126_ADT <= #DAT# AND E.CS126_USD <= #DAT# AND E.CS126_UHJ >= SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6)||'01' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 F ON F.MANDT = B.MANDT AND F.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND F.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND F.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND F.CS116_GND = 'A' AND F.CS116_BST <= #DAT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 G ON G.MANDT = B.MANDT AND G.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND G.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND G.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND G.CS126_DDT = '' AND G.CS126_GND = 'C' AND G.CS126_ADT <= #DAT#, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE B.MANDT = '183' AND B.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND B.CS101_BSU = WB.LGORT AND WB.LGORT > '' AND B.CS101_IGD BETWEEN '00000001' AND #DAT# AND SUBSTR(B.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND B.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS101_ARA > '' AND B.CS101_BSU > '' AND B.CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' AND B.CS101_FDT <= #DAT#
AND B.CS101_ARA = #ARA#
AND B.CS101_BSU = #BSU#
AND B.CS101_BPM = #BPM#
AND WB.VKGRP = #TEM#
GROUP BY B.CS101_PJT, B.CS101_HNO ) A ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = '183' AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_FSD <= #DAT# AND B.CS143_FSD <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS144_PJT, CS144_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = '183' GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJO AND A.HNO = D.HNO, SAPHEE.ZCST111 F INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 G ON F.MANDT = G.MANDT AND F.PJT = G.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 H ON F.MANDT = H.MANDT AND F.PJT = H.POSID AND F.PJT||F.HNO = H.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS Z ON F.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND F.BLD = Z.CODE2 AND Z.LANG = 'ko' AND Z.CODE1 = 'CS123' WHERE A.PJT = F.PJT AND A.HNO = F.HNO AND F.MANDT = '183' AND (F.HST <> 'D' OR (F.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(D.PJO,'') > '')) AND (SUBSTR(VALUE(A.BGT,''),1,6) > SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6) OR VALUE(A.BGT,'') = '') AND (VALUE(A.USD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(A.USD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(B.JHD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(B.JHD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(D.MDT,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(D.MDT,'') = '') AND A.PJTM = '' AND A.PJTU = '' AND F.EXC = '' AND A.ARA > ''
UNION ALL
SELECT F.CS101_PJT PJT ,F.CS101_HNO HNO ,VALUE(I.BLD,'') BLD ,VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(F.MANDT,'CS115',F.CS101_ARA),'') ARA_NM ,VALUE(F.CS101_ARA,'') ARA ,VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(F.MANDT,F.CS101_BSU),'') BSU_NM ,VALUE(F.CS101_BSU,'') BSU FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 F INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 G ON F.MANDT = G.MANDT AND F.CS101_PJT = G.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 H ON F.MANDT = H.MANDT AND F.CS101_PJT = H.POSID AND F.CS101_PJT||F.CS101_HNO = H.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 I ON F.MANDT = I.MANDT AND F.CS101_PJT = I.PJT AND F.CS101_HNO = I.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS Z ON I.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND I.BLD = Z.CODE2 AND Z.LANG = 'ko' AND Z.CODE1 = 'CS123', SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE F.MANDT = '183' AND F.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND F.CS101_BSU = WB.LGORT AND WB.LGORT > '' AND SUBSTR(F.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND F.CS101_PST = 'A1' AND F.CS101_ARA > '' AND F.CS101_IGD BETWEEN '00000001' AND #DAT# AND F.CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' AND F.MDATE <= #DAT#
AND F.CS101_ARA = #ARA#
AND F.CS101_BSU = #BSU#
AND F.CS101_BPM = #BPM#
AND WB.VKGRP = #TEM#
UNION ALL ------------ --¹«»ó°ø»ç-- ------------ SELECT A.PJT PJT ,A.HNO HNO ,A.BLD BLD ,VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',A.ARA),'') ARA_NM ,VALUE(A.ARA,'') ARA ,VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(A.MANDT,A.BSU),'') BSU_NM ,VALUE(A.BSU,'') BSU FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.WDT, A.WNO, A.SCT, A.RCD, A.IGD, A.ISD, A.IJY, Z.BGT, Z.BMT, Z.GNO, G.ZSITE_NM, G.KUNNR_NM, G.ADDR1||' '||G.ADDR2 P1C, H.ZSPEC1, H.ZSPEC2, H.ZSPEC3, H.ZSPEC7, H.ZSPEC12, F.ABG, F.BPM, F.JUJ, F.BUJ, H.ZOIPSU, H.ZMUSAOCNT, H.ZMUSAOCNT2, H.ZZGUBUN, Z.CTEXT2 BLD_NM, F.BLD FROM ( SELECT MAX(B.MANDT) MANDT, B.CS101_PJT PJT, B.CS101_HNO HNO, MAX(B.CS101_ARA) ARA, MAX(B.CS101_BSU) BSU, MIN(B.CS101_WDT) WDT, MIN(B.CS101_WNO) WNO, MIN(B.CS101_SCT) SCT, MIN(B.CS101_RCD) RCD, MIN(B.CS101_IGD) IGD, MIN(B.CS101_ISD) ISD, MIN(B.CS101_IJY) IJY, MIN(VALUE(A.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT, MAX(VALUE(A.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT, MIN(VALUE(C.CS126_USD,'')) USD, MAX(VALUE(A.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 A ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND A.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND A.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS116_GND = 'B' AND A.CS116_BST <= #DAT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND C.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_GND = 'D' AND C.CS126_ADT <= #DAT#, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE B.MANDT = '183' AND B.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND B.CS101_BSU = WB.LGORT AND WB.LGORT > '' AND B.CS101_IGD <= #DAT# AND SUBSTR(B.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND B.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS101_ARA > '' AND B.CS101_BSU > '' AND B.MDATE <= #DAT#
AND B.CS101_ARA = #ARA#
AND B.CS101_BSU = #BSU#
AND B.CS101_BPM = #BPM#
AND WB.VKGRP = #TEM#
GROUP BY B.CS101_PJT, B.CS101_HNO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = '183' AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_FSD <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS144_PJT, CS144_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = '183' GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJO AND A.HNO = D.HNO, SAPHEE.ZCST111 F INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 G ON F.MANDT = G.MANDT AND F.PJT = G.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 H ON F.MANDT = H.MANDT AND F.PJT = H.POSID AND F.PJT||F.HNO = H.POSID_1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT CS116_PJT PJT, CS116_HNO HNO, MIN(CS116_BGT) BGT, MAX(CS116_BMT) BMT, MAX(CS116_GNO) GNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND SUBSTR(CS116_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'A' AND CS116_BST <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) AS Z ON F.PJT = Z.PJT AND F.HNO = Z.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS Z ON F.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND F.BLD = Z.CODE2 AND Z.LANG = 'ko' AND Z.CODE1 = 'CS123' WHERE A.PJT = F.PJT AND A.HNO = F.HNO AND F.MANDT = '183' AND (F.HST <> 'D' OR (F.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(D.PJO,'') > '')) AND (SUBSTR(VALUE(A.BGT,''),1,6) > SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6) OR VALUE(A.BGT,'') = '') AND (VALUE(A.USD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(A.USD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(B.JHD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(B.JHD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(D.MDT,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(D.MDT,'') = '') AND Z.BGT <= #DAT# AND Z.BMT >= SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6)||'01' AND F.EXC = '' ) A
UNION ALL -------------- -- À¯»ó°ø»ç -- -------------- SELECT A.PJT PJT ,A.HNO HNO ,A.BLD BLD ,VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',A.ARA),'') ARA_NM ,VALUE(A.ARA,'') ARA ,VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(A.MANDT,A.BSU),'') BSU_NM ,VALUE(A.BSU,'') BSU FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, Z.UPN, Z.SLA, Z.USD, Z.UHJ, Z.GNO, Z.AMT, A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.WDT, A.WNO, A.SCT, A.RCD, A.IGD, A.ISD, A.IJY, A.BGT_A, A.BMT_A, A.GNO_A, A.BGT_B, A.BMT_B, A.GNO_B, G.ZSITE_NM, G.KUNNR_NM, H.ZSPEC1, H.ZSPEC2, H.ZSPEC3, H.ZSPEC7, H.ZSPEC12, F.ABG, F.BPM, F.JUJ, F.BUJ, H.ZOIPSU, H.ZMUSAOCNT, H.ZMUSAOCNT2, H.ZZGUBUN, I.CS121_P1B ||' '|| I.CS121_P2B P1B, I.CS121_P1C ||' '|| I.CS121_P2C P1C, Z.CTEXT2 BLD_NM, F.BLD FROM ( SELECT MAX(B.MANDT) MANDT, B.CS101_PJT PJT, B.CS101_HNO HNO, MAX(B.CS101_ARA) ARA, MAX(B.CS101_BSU) BSU, MIN(B.CS101_WDT) WDT, MIN(B.CS101_WNO) WNO, MIN(B.CS101_SCT) SCT, MIN(B.CS101_RCD) RCD, MIN(B.CS101_IGD) IGD, MIN(B.CS101_ISD) ISD, MIN(B.CS101_IJY) IJY, MIN(VALUE(Y.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT_A, MAX(VALUE(Y.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT_A, MAX(VALUE(Y.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO_A, MIN(VALUE(A.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT_B, MAX(VALUE(A.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT_B, MAX(VALUE(A.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO_B, MIN(VALUE(C.CS126_USD,'')) USD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 A ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND A.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND A.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS116_GND = 'B' AND A.CS116_FDT <= #DAT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 Y ON Y.MANDT = B.MANDT AND Y.CS116_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND Y.CS116_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND Y.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND Y.CS116_GND = 'A' AND Y.CS116_FDT <= #DAT# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.CS126_PJT = B.CS101_PJT AND C.CS126_HNO = B.CS101_HNO AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_GND = 'D' AND C.CS126_ADT <= #DAT#, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE B.MANDT = '183' AND B.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND B.CS101_BSU = WB.LGORT AND WB.LGORT > '' AND B.CS101_IGD <= #DAT# AND SUBSTR(B.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND B.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS101_ARA > '' AND B.CS101_BSU > '' AND B.MDATE <= #DAT#
AND B.CS101_ARA = #ARA#
AND B.CS101_BSU = #BSU#
AND B.CS101_BPM = #BPM#
AND WB.VKGRP = #TEM#
GROUP BY B.CS101_PJT, B.CS101_HNO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = '183' AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_FSD <= #DAT# GROUP BY CS144_PJT, CS144_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = '183' GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJO AND A.HNO = D.HNO, SAPHEE.ZCST111 F INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 G ON F.MANDT = G.MANDT AND F.PJT = G.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 H ON F.MANDT = H.MANDT AND F.PJT = H.POSID AND F.PJT||F.HNO = H.POSID_1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_UPN UPN, CS126_CST CST, CS126_PJT PJT, CS126_HNO HNO, CS126_USD USD, CS126_UHJ UHJ, CS126_SLA SLA, CS126_GNO GNO, CS126_AMT AMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND SUBSTR(CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_GND = 'C' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_ADT <= #DAT# AND CS126_USD <= #DAT# AND CS126_UHJ >= SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6)||'01' ) AS Z ON F.PJT = Z.PJT AND F.HNO = Z.HNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 I ON I.MANDT = '183' AND Z.UPN = I.CS121_UPN AND Z.CST = I.CS121_CST LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS Z ON F.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND F.BLD = Z.CODE2 AND Z.LANG = 'ko' AND Z.CODE1 = 'CS123' WHERE A.PJT = F.PJT AND A.HNO = F.HNO AND F.MANDT = '183' AND (F.HST <> 'D' OR (F.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(D.PJO,'') > '')) AND (SUBSTR(VALUE(A.BGT_B,''),1,6) > SUBSTR(#DAT#,1,6) OR VALUE(A.BGT_B,'') = '') AND (VALUE(A.USD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(A.USD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(B.JHD,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(B.JHD,'') = '') AND (VALUE(D.MDT,'') > #DAT# OR VALUE(D.MDT,'') = '') AND F.EXC = '' ) A ) A GROUP BY A.ARA_NM, A.ARA, A.BSU_NM, A.BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ARA_NM ARA_NM, A.ARA, '¼Ò°è' BSU_NM, '9999' BSU, '¹Ì¹ßÁÖ' GBN, '' KND, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '25' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT01, 0 AMT01, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT02, 0 AMT02, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT03, 0 AMT03, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT04, 0 AMT04, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT05, 0 AMT05, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT06, 0 AMT06, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT07, 0 AMT07, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '24' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT08, 0 AMT08, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT09, 0 AMT09, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT10, 0 AMT10, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '07' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT11, 0 AMT11, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD = '09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT12, 0 AMT12, SUM(CASE WHEN A.BLD NOT IN ('25','03','05','01','12','04','02','06','11','07','09') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CNT13, 0 AMT13, COUNT(*) CNT_H, 0 AMT_H FROM ( SELECT A.PJT PJT ,A.HNO HNO ,F.BLD BLD ,VALUE(SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(F.MANDT,'CS115',F.ARA),'') ARA_NM ,VALUE(F.ARA,'') ARA ,VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(F.MANDT,F.BSU),'') BSU_NM ,VALUE(F.BSU,'') BSU FROM ( SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.BGT, A.USD, A.PJTM, A.PJTU, A.WDT, A.WNO, A.SCT, A.RCD, A.IGD, A.ISD, A.IJY, A.BGT_A, A.BMT_A, A.GNO_A, A.USD_C, A.UHJ_C, A.GNO_C FROM ( SELECT B.CS101_PJT PJT, B.CS101_HNO HNO, MAX(B.CS101_ARA) ARA, MAX(B.CS101_BSU) BSU, MIN(B.CS101_WDT) WDT, MIN(B.CS101_WNO) WNO, MIN(B.CS101_SCT) SCT, MIN(B.CS101_RCD) RCD, MIN(B.CS101_IGD) IGD, MIN(B.CS101_ISD) ISD, MIN(B.CS101_IJY) IJY, MIN(VALUE(A.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT, MIN(VALUE(C.CS126_USD,'')) USD, MIN(VALUE(D.CS116_PJT,'')) PJTM, MIN(VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'')) PJTU, MIN(VALUE(F.CS116_BGT,'')) BGT_A, MAX(VALUE(F.CS116_BMT,'')) BMT_A, MAX(VALUE(F.CS116_GNO,'')) GNO_A, MIN(VALUE(G.CS126_USD,'')) USD_C, MAX(VALUE(G.CS126_UHJ,'')) UHJ_C, MAX(VALUE(G.CS126_GNO,'')) GNO_C FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 B LEFT
